participant_1.background:
I love to be active and look my best, but I can get sad when I lose a loved one.
i work as a veterinarian.
i own four german shepherds.
i like meat too much.
After quitting my job, I devoted my time to raising and selling pigs.

participant_2.background:
My most exotic place was in the mountains of Nepal where I went hiking and got to see the Himalayas.
i have two dogs.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!
i live in a big city.
I play disc golf because it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie.

content.text: I like to play disc golf, it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie.
That sounds fun. I like hiking and exploring new places. I went to Nepal a few years ago and hiked the Himalayas.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Nepal. What was it like?
It was incredible! The scenery was absolutely breathtaking, and the people were so friendly. I would definitely recommend going if you ever get the chance.
I'm definitely going to have to put that on my bucket list. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What's your favorite food?
I love sushi, especially sashimi. I'm a big fan of seafood in general.
Me too! I love salmon and tuna. What's your favorite type of sushi?
I love California rolls and spicy tuna rolls.
Those are both good choices. I'm a big fan of salmon rolls.
We should go out for sushi sometime!
That sounds like a plan! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll check out some restaurants and let you know what I find.
